From Interstate 70, take the State Route 79 North exit 129B and go north 6 miles.

From State Route 16, take the State Route 79 South exit and go south 2 miles.

Heath has no mass transit, so a vehicle will be needed to travel in the city.

There are two bike trails in the city.
is a restored 1800s farmhouse, owned by the city, that hosts various tea and luncheon events.

The Indian Mound Mall and the Southgate Shopping Center are the two largest retail centers in Heath. Heath does not have a traditional downtown area and most of the retail businesses in the city are located on State Route 79.
